name: Stownest
headline: Flexible On-Demand Storage Space for Household, SMEs & Travellers.
description:
Valet self-storage solution for your personal storage needs. Be it household storage or seasonal belongings, we will pick them up and store them in our facility. You get it back when you need it. 

Service built on technology and strong customer experience fundamentals.

founders.name: Sudhindra Subbarao, Founder
founders.description:
Engineer by Qualification. Explorer at heart. Entrepreneurship and Travel excite me.

- Co-Founder of Stownest Storage - building reliable Self Storage for India
- 15 years in Product Development &  Customer Engineering in HPE
- Founded Wild Wanderers Adventures

founders.name: Ramesh Chincholi, Founder
founders.description: Ramesh Chincholi is an entrepreneur and technologist, who has co-founded 2 tech startups with one successful exit, and played instrumental roles in scaling 3 high growth startups to tens of millions of users, in his career spanning 16 years.

# Storage that you can "Trust On"
[Get Instant Quote](https://stownest.com/</booking/request>)
Generate quote online, Get 20% off on packaging and moving! and Upto 20% discounts on long term storage**
## Hassle-free storage with move-in help 
A new kind of storage that you can "Trust On"
We come to you
and do the heavy lifting
We secure it in
our storage facility
We bring it back
whenever you want
a place for everything and everything in its place
#### Creating extra space for growing urban needs
Valet self storage solution for your personal storage needs. Be it household storage or seasonal belongings, we will pick them up and store them in our facility. You get it back when you need it. Option for both Short term and Long term available. It’s time to look into affordable self storage with StowNest! 
  * Flexibility - Allows you pay only for space you use
  * Convenience - Removes the pain of moving
  * Security - 24/7 security and a centralized monitoring system


[Get Instant Quote](https://stownest.com/</booking/request>)
#### 12K
##### Customers served
#### 20K
##### Pickups & Deliveries
#### 250K
##### Cataloged Items
#### 1.5M
##### Square feet of storage
A valet self storage experience that you will love it
### Smart pricing. Secure storage.
### Full Service Storage
Let us do all the work! We’ll pack, move and deliver back your stuff — so you don’t have to.
### Flexible Pay per Use plan
Need to store more or less? We'll adjust your plan accordingly. Cancel contracts without penalty at any time
### Security you count on
Our facilities are equipped with alarms motion-sensing cameras, and 24/7 security.
### Covered for 2.5 Lacs
Insurance coverage against Fire, Burglary or transient damages.
### Unique ID for all your items
Inwarding and Outwarding is through self storage software and barcode scanning
### High Standard Packaging
All our customers are highly appreciative of our packaging service
### We have personal self storage space for all
High standard personal storage services for your home, office and business needs. We create, optimize and offer cost-effective storage space enabled by smart storage space management platform.
![img](https://www.gstatic.com/psa/static/1.gif)
#### Have more belongings than your space?
**Store your occasionally used belongings in our personal storage units.**
![img](https://www.gstatic.com/psa/static/1.gif)
#### Making a big move or Renovating house?
**Store your home or office belongings in our storage containers.**
![img](https://www.gstatic.com/psa/static/1.gif)
#### Traveling short term for business trip?
**Store your belongings for short term in our on-demand warehouse facility.**
[Get Instant Quote](https://stownest.com/</booking/request>)
### OurTestimonials
![img](https://www.gstatic.com/psa/static/1.gif)
### Samavedam Prashanth
**Belandur**
The team (Sharath and Team)were extremely professional and handled everything very well. There were more items than originally estimated but they ensured everything was packed and loaded properly. Highly recommended!!
![img](https://www.gstatic.com/psa/static/1.gif)
### Bhanu Prakash
**Yelahanka**
Used the storage space while I was moving out of Bangalore. Visited the storage area in person and was very much impressed by the quality of work and the commitment of the friendly staff. Excellent service. Was very happy. I would definitely recommend StowNest for Storage.
![img](https://www.gstatic.com/psa/static/1.gif)
### Ritu Singh
**Kormanagala**
Honestly... I didn't know what to expect. I was apprehensive, it seemed too good to be true. But the pricing ended up being transparent and fair. Highly recommend!
![img](https://www.gstatic.com/psa/static/1.gif)
### Thouseef Hameed
**Indiranagar**
The staff did an outstanding job of packing. I was pleasantly surprised with the way they handled packages. Ravi was very helpful. I would gladly recommend them for any storage requirements.
![img](https://www.gstatic.com/psa/static/1.gif)
### Balakumaran Lenin
**Hosur**
Very good experience. Reasonable price and very good packing. Very good labor and Sharath did a awesome job supervising them. Overall a splendid experience.
![img](https://www.gstatic.com/psa/static/1.gif)
### Kumaraswamy GM
**Sanjaynagar**
Supervisors co-ordination with me was excellent and were flexible with my plans and needs. Packing service was really good and staff did a wonderful job. Overall much satisifed.
![img](https://www.gstatic.com/psa/static/1.gif)
### Sarita Srivastava
**Yeshwanthpur**
Fantastic Service by Stownest. Hardworking team and really prompt responses. Will definitely hire again!
![img](https://www.gstatic.com/psa/static/1.gif)
### Shashank Shekhar
**Bannerghatta Road**
Sharth was the supervisor for my relocation and I was really very impressed by the professionalism. Very quick in packing and extremely brilliant service. Amazing behaviour by sharath and team. Got a good deal from Ameith who is the manager and very supportive
![img](https://www.gstatic.com/psa/static/1.gif)
### Tomoyo T
**Kasturinagar**
Great customer experience and support by stownest team. Our relocation was done perfectly as per schedule. Thank you
![img](https://www.gstatic.com/psa/static/1.gif)
### Charith Kumar
**Sarjapura Road**
Before now, anytime I needed to store anything I had to rent a truck, rent a space, get some buddies to help me. Stownest did it all for me, which saved me the headache.
![img](https://www.gstatic.com/psa/static/1.gif)
### Saritha
**Ramamurthy Nagar**
Outstanding service. Stownest has nailed a wonderful solution for the storage industry. It was more competitively priced than me getting my own storage unit.

generated_description:
**Stownest: The Flexible Solution for Your Storage Needs**

Founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, Stownest is revolutionizing the storage landscape from its base in Bengaluru, India. The company's mission is straightforward: provide flexible, on-demand storage space tailored for households, SMEs, and travelers alike. 

Initially, they launched as a valet self-storage solution, aimed specifically at personal storage needs. Whether it’s seasonal belongings or other household items, Stownest picks up your items, secures them in their facility, and returns them whenever you need them. It’s all about convenience, security, and giving you back your space.

### Why Stownest Stands Out:
1. **Technology-Driven Experience**: Stownest has integrated technology to optimize storage and enhance customer interaction, ensuring a smooth experience throughout the process.
   
2. **Customer-Oriented Flexibility**: Customers pay only for the space they use, and can cancel contracts without penalties at any time. It’s a storage plan that adjusts as your needs change.

3. **Top-notch Security**: Their facilities are well-equipped with surveillance, alarms, and comprehensive insurance covering potential damages. 

4. **Full-Service Convenience**: Stownest takes care of the logistics—from packing and moving your items to delivering them back to you, allowing you to avoid the typical hassle associated with storage.

5. **Impressive Metrics**: They've served over 12,000 customers, facilitated 20,000 pickups and deliveries, and cataloged 250,000 items within their 1.5 million square feet of storage space.

### Services Offered:
- **Personal Storage**: A reliable solution for storing infrequently used belongings.
- **Business Storage**: Catering specifically to the storage needs of SMEs.
- **Moving Services**: From packing to storage, they've got you covered.

### What Customers Are Saying:
Testimonials highlight the professionalism of the Stownest team, the transparency in pricing, and the impressive packing service. Customers appreciate the convenience and ease of use that Stownest offers—which is especially crucial in bustling urban settings.

### Connect with Stownest:
You can visit their website [Stownest.com](https://stownest.com) for instant quotes or to learn more about their services. They’re active on social media, providing updates and engaging with their community—so check them out on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn.

In a world where space is a premium and time is of the essence, Stownest emerges as a compelling solution, ensuring that you're never bogged down with excess baggage, both literally and figuratively. Whether you're moving, renovating, or just need a little extra space, they've got your back.
